text: Neale Francis Daniher (born 15 February 1961) is a former Australian rules footballer. He played for Essendon Football Club in the Australian Football League (AFL) from 1979 to 1990. He later coached Melbourne Football Club between 1998 and 2007. He also had coaching roles with Essendon, Fremantle and West Coast. His brothers, Terry, Anthony and Chris, also played for Essendon. He was born in West Wyalong, New South Wales. Daniher was told he had motor neurone disease in 2013. He is now a campaigner for medical research of the disease. ==References== ==Other websites== * Neale Daniher at AFL Tables Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Australian rules footballers Category:Australian rules football coaches Category:Order of Australia Category:Sportspeople from New South Wales
title: Neale Daniher
